summary: Registered Nurse with BSN from Loyola University Chicago and approximately 4 years of MICU experience, including 2 years as a Nurse Clinician II in Medical/Cardiac ICU and Interventional Unit. Experienced in telemetry monitoring, ventilator management, CRRT/CVVH therapy, hypothermia therapy, TPA management, IABP management, life-support equipment, IV and high-potency medication administration, and end-of-life care. Proactive in education and precepting nursing students; strong patient-family communication; seeking a Doctor of Nursing Practice (DNP) with concentration in nurse anesthesia (CRNA).
skills: Flow Trac device (Cardiac Output, Cardiac Index monitoring)

experience.title: Nurse Clinician II - Medical/Cardiac Intensive Care Units and Interventional Unit
experience.description: Provide compassionate care to critically-ill patients; telemetry monitoring, ventilator management, CRRT/CVVH therapy, hypothermia therapy, TPA and IABP management; manage life-support equipment and IV medications; respond to cardiac and respiratory codes per ACLS guidelines; educate families; precept nursing students; provide end-of-life care; contribute to high patient satisfaction.

experience.title: Dancer
experience.description: Lead, cheer, and support the Chicago Bulls during basketball games; promote crowd involvement; participate in charity work, fundraisers, and community events; manage practice sessions and gameday readiness.

experience.title: Nursing Care Technician II - Medical/Cardiac ICU and Interventional Unit
experience.description: Dual role as Nursing Care Technician/Unit Secretary on a 33-bed Medical/Cardiac/Interventional ICU floor; basic patient care, phlebotomy, 12-lead EKG, wound care, and assistance to nurses; unit secretarial duties.
